Package import
```{r}
# Load package
# install.packages("flux")
library(rscorecard)
```


Import field variables
```{r}
starfish.fields <- read.csv("Data/Starfish_Fields.csv")
head(starfish.fields)
starfish.colnames <- tolower(starfish.colnames$VARIABLE.NAME)
```


# Accessing Data
```{r}
sc_key('lt36uO4r7wWfcijac20x6e6FforftHUitahjuh1A')

starfish.df <- sc_init() %>%  
    sc_filter(stabbr == 'FL') %>% 
    sc_select_(starfish.colnames) %>%
    sc_get()

for (year in 2015:2018) {
  starfishdf.temp <- sc_init() %>%
    sc_filter(stabbr == 'FL') %>%
    sc_select_(starfish.colnames) %>%
    sc_year(year) %>%
    sc_get()
  starfish.df <- rbind(starfish.df, starfishdf.temp)
}


head(starfishdf)


```
